Enums/AuthenticationLevel.html#/s:FO7Omn.abstract: Passcode authentication if Biometric authentication is not available, else biometric authentication.

Enums/AuthenticationError.html#/s:FO7Omn.abstract: Authentication was not successful, because user failed to provide valid credentials.

Enums/AuthenticationError.html#/s:FO7Omn.name: userCancel
Enums/AuthenticationError.html#/s:FO7Omn.abstract: Authentication was canceled by user (e.g. tapped Cancel button).

Enums/AuthenticationError.html#/s:FO7Omn.name: userFallback
Enums/AuthenticationError.html#/s:FO7Omn.abstract: Authentication was canceled, because the user tapped the fallback button (Enter Password).

Enums/AuthenticationError.html#/s:FO7Omn.name: systemCancel
Enums/AuthenticationError.html#/s:FO7Omn.abstract: Authentication was canceled by system (e.g. another application went to foreground).

Enums/AuthenticationError.html#/s:FO7Omn.name: passcodeNotSet
Enums/AuthenticationError.html#/s:FO7Omn.abstract: Authentication could not start, because passcode is not set on the device.

Enums/AuthenticationError.html#/s:FO7Omn.name: touchIDNotAvailable
Enums/AuthenticationError.html#/s:FO7Omn.abstract: Authentication could not start, because Touch ID is not available on the device.

Enums/AuthenticationError.html#/s:FO7Omn.name: touchIDNotEnrolled
Enums/AuthenticationError.html#/s:FO7Omn.abstract: Authentication could not start, because Touch ID has no enrolled fingers.

Enums/AuthenticationError.html#/s:FO7Omn.name: touchIDLockout
Enums/AuthenticationError.html#/s:FO7Omn.abstract: Authentication was not successful, because there were too many failed Touch ID attempts and

Enums/AuthenticationError.html#/s:FO7Omn.name: appCancel
Enums/AuthenticationError.html#/s:FO7Omn.abstract: Authentication was canceled by application (e.g. invalidate was called while

Enums/AuthenticationError.html#/s:FO7Omn.abstract: LAContext passed to this call has been previously invalidated.

Enums/AuthenticationError.html#/s:FO7Omn.name: unexpectedError
Enums/AuthenticationError.html#/s:FO7Omn.abstract: An unexpected error occurred while authenticating user.

Enums/AuthenticationError.html#/s:ZvO7Om.abstract: The domain used for creating all errors.

Classes/OmnyPayAuth.html.name: OmnyPayAuth
Classes/OmnyPayAuth.html.abstract: A final class that can be used to authenticate user using biometric authentication

Classes/AuthConfig.html.name: AuthConfig
Classes/AuthConfig.html.abstract: An instance that represents the configuration of user authentication. OmnyPayAuth instance can be configured with custom authentication level, whether to authenticate user using only biometric authentication or by using passcode if biometric authentication is not present. By default, user will be authenticated using biometric authentication only.

Classes/AuthResult.html.name: AuthResult
Classes/AuthResult.html.abstract: An object of AuthResult represents the results of user authentication. This object contains a boolean value for authentication status and an error if user authentication fails.

Enums/AuthenticationError.html.name: AuthenticationError
Enums/AuthenticationError.html.abstract: AuthenticationError represents error, if any, which occurred during authentication

Classes/OmnyPayScan.html.abstract: A final class that can be used to scan machine readable codes like QRCode, BarCode etc.

Classes/ScanConfig.html.name: ScanConfig
Classes/ScanConfig.html.abstract: An instance that represents the configuration of scanner. OmnyPayScan instance can be configured with custom scan mode, code types to scan, whether to start scanning as soon as scanner is presented and a custom dictionary for any other information.

Enums/ScanMode.html.name: ScanMode
Enums/ScanMode.html.abstract: A type that represents the scanning mode of OmnyPayScan

Classes/ScanResult.html.name: ScanResult
Classes/ScanResult.html.abstract: An object of ScanResult represents the results of scan operation. This object contains a string value of scanned code, a meta type of code and an error if scanning fails.

Enums/OmnyPayError.html.name: OmnyPayError
Enums/OmnyPayError.html.abstract: OmnyPayError is an error type returned by OmnyPay, that tells about specific error that can occurs while accessing OmnyPay APIs. It encompasses a few different types of errors, each with their own associated reasons.

Classes/Shopper.html.name: Shopper

Classes/Item.html.abstract: An Item represents a single item in a basket.

Classes/BasketPreview.html.name: BasketPreview
Classes/BasketPreview.html.abstract: The BasketPreview represents a preview of active shopping session, which includes product line items, discount offers, selected payment instrument, final reconciled totals for selected payment instrument and loyalty points.

Classes/BasketReceipt.html.name: BasketReceipt
Classes/BasketReceipt.html.abstract: The BasketReceipt represents a Payment receipt of active shopping session, which includes product line items, discount offers, selected payment instrument, final reconciled totals for selected payment instrument and loyalty redemption status.

Classes/TotalSummary.html.name: TotalSummary
Classes/TotalSummary.html.abstract: TotalSummary represents a final summary of a basket or a preview of basket (BasketPreview) or a payment receipt (Receipt)

Classes/BasketPaymentConfirmation.html.name: BasketPaymentConfirmation
Classes/BasketPaymentConfirmation.html.abstract: BasketPaymentConfirmation represents a payment confirmation for a basket.

Classes/PaymentInstrumentInfo.html.name: PaymentInstrumentInfo
Classes/PaymentInstrumentInfo.html.abstract: PaymentInstrumentInfo contains information about a payment instrument.

Classes/ProductOffer.html.name: ProductOffer
Classes/ProductOffer.html.abstract: ProductOffer represents an offer associated with a product.

Classes/ReconciledTotal.html.name: ReconciledTotal
Classes/ReconciledTotal.html.abstract: ReconciledTotal represents a final reconciled total for a product after applying all the taxes, offers and discounts.

Classes/ReceiptItem.html.name: ReceiptItem
Classes/ReceiptItem.html.abstract: ReceiptItem represents an item in payment receipt.

Enums/PaymentType.html.name: PaymentType
Enums/PaymentType.html.abstract: An enum that represents a payment card type

Classes/PaymentConfirmation.html.name: PaymentConfirmation
Classes/PaymentConfirmation.html.abstract: PaymentConfirmation represents a confirmation for the payment.

Classes/PaymentTypeOffer.html.name: PaymentTypeOffer
Classes/PaymentTypeOffer.html.abstract: PaymentTypeOffer represents an offer for a payment type.

Classes/MerchantOffer.html.name: MerchantOffer
Classes/MerchantOffer.html.abstract: MerchantOffer represents an offer given out by a merchant.

Classes/ProvisionCardParam.html.name: ProvisionCardParam
Classes/ProvisionCardParam.html.abstract: Model object that represents details of the card that needs to be provisioned for a shopper.

Classes/SetDefaultPaymentInstrumentValue.name: SetDefaultPaymentInstrumentValue
Classes/SetDefaultPaymentInstrumentValue.abstract: SetDefaultPaymentInstrumentValue object represents a default payment instrument for the shopper.

Classes/ShopperLoyalty.html.name: ShopperLoyalty
Classes/ShopperLoyalty.html.abstract: The ShopperLoyalty represents the accrued and redeemed loyalty points for a shopper.

Classes/Reward.html.name: Reward
Classes/Reward.html.abstract: Reward represents a resource which details the reward that can be availed for the current active shopping session.

Structs/Store.html#/s:ZvV7OmnyPay5Store1.name: isSDKInitialized
Structs/Store.html#/s:ZvV7OmnyPay5Store1.abstract: Returns whether SDK is initialized correctly with valid merchant id or not.

Structs/Store.html.name: Store
Structs/Store.html.abstract: A global store to provide access to data for running transaction session.

Protocols/OmnyPayEventDelegate.html#/s:F.name: didUpdateBasket(basket:)
Protocols/OmnyPayEventDelegate.html#/s:F.abstract: Tells the delegate that current basket is updated with new items.

Protocols/OmnyPayEventDelegate.html#/s:F.name: didReceiveReceipt(receipt:)
Protocols/OmnyPayEventDelegate.html#/s:F.abstract: Tells the delegate that a payment receipt has been received.

Protocols/OmnyPayEventDelegate.html#/s:F.name: didReceivePostPaymentOffer(imageUrl:)
Protocols/OmnyPayEventDelegate.html#/s:F.abstract: Tells the delegate that a post payment offer has been received.

Protocols/OmnyPayEventDelegate.html#/s:F.name: didCancelTransaction()
Protocols/OmnyPayEventDelegate.html#/s:F.abstract: Tells the delegate that the active transaction has been cancelled.

Protocols/OmnyPayEventDelegate.html.name: OmnyPayEventDelegate
Protocols/OmnyPayEventDelegate.html.abstract: Type adopting OmnyPayEventDelegate protocol can be used to listen for callbacks that are delivered when any OmnyPay event occurs. All the callback functions are called on main queue. Delegate of OmnyPayEventListener must adopt this protocol.

Classes/OmnyPayEventListener.html#/s:ZvC.name: shared
Classes/OmnyPayEventListener.html#/s:ZvC.abstract: Returns a shared singleton instance of OmnyPayEventListener.

Classes/OmnyPayEventListener.html#/s:vC7.name: delegate
Classes/OmnyPayEventListener.html#/s:vC7.abstract: A delegate of OmnyPayEventDelegate type. All the event callbacks are delivered to this delegate instance.

Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.name: initialize(withMerchantId:configuration:completion:)
Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.abstract: Initializes the SDK and registers with OmnyPay Platform using the merchant id.

Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.name: getMerchantInfo(completion:)
Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.abstract: Get details of the merchant.

Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.name: createSession(completion:)
Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.abstract: Create and establish a session between a shopper’s device and Merchant. Session associates a Device and/or a Shopper with a Merchant and Store. It offers a channel over which the Merchant can message the shopper and track their progress from an unauthenticated state, to authenticated state and subsequently through a checkout workflow.

Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.name: getCurrentSession(completion:)
Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.abstract: Get the current transaction Session between shopper and Merchant.

Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.name: authenticateShopper(shopperId:authToken:completion:)
Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.abstract: Authenticates the shopper with the Identity service associated with the Retailer/Merchant.

Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.name: createBasket(completion:)
Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.abstract: Create a Basket for the current authenticated transaction Session. This function is idempotent i.e it returns the basket for an existing session and if none exists, it creates and returns a new basket.

Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.name: getShopper(completion:)
Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.abstract: Gets a Shopper object that represents the details associated with a shopper.

Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.name: getPaymentInstruments(completion:)
Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.abstract: Get all the payment intruments associated with the current shopper.

Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.name: setDefault(paymentInstrument:completion:)
Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.abstract: Set default payment instrument for current shopper.

Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.name: checkin(onPointOfSale:completion:)
Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.abstract: Checkin the shopper associated with the session with the Point of Sale.

Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.name: getBasket(completion:)
Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.abstract: Get the basket associated with current shopper session.

Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.name: updateBasket(withBasket:completion:)
Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.abstract: Update the basket associated with current shopper with basket items.

Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.name: getPaymentReceipt(completion:)
Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.abstract: Get the payment receipt for a Basket associated with the current shopper session.

Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.name: redeemLoyalty(points:completion:)
Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.abstract: Redeem loyalty points for current shopper.

Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.name: startPayment(withPaymentInstrument:completion:)
Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.abstract: Start payment for basket with selected payment instrument.

Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.name: preview(forPaymentInstrument:completion:)
Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.abstract: Preview the basket with selected payment instrument.

Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.name: getReceipts(completion:)
Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.abstract: Get all receipts for current shopper.

Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.name: getPaymentInstrumentOffers(completion:)
Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.abstract: Get offers related to all payment types for a merchant.

Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.name: getProductOffers(completion:)
Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.abstract: Get offers related to all products for a merchant.

Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.name: getSkuOffers(completion:)
Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.abstract: Get offers related to all skus for a merchant.

Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.name: getRewards(completion:)
Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.abstract: Get rewards for a merchant.

Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.name: provision(paymentInstrument:completion:)
Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.abstract: Provision a new payment instrument to the vault registered for the merchant.

Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.name: setLoyalty(withPoints:completion:)
Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.abstract: Set loyalty points for shopper.

Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.name: getLoyalty(completion:)
Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.abstract: Get loyalty points for shopper.

Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.name: getShopperProfile(completion:)
Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.abstract: Get shopper profile.

Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.name: displayProductPage(inView:usingCode:)
Classes/OmnyPayAPI.html#/s:ZFC7OmnyPay10.abstract: Get product details page using scanned QR code. This method can be called after following successful calls:

Classes/OmnyPayEventListener.html.name: OmnyPayEventListener
Classes/OmnyPayEventListener.html.abstract: A singleton object that can be used for listening OmnyPay events.

Other Enums.html.name: Other Enums
Other Enums.html.abstract: The following enums are available globally.
